role.argrole: entity for which arg0 leads the way
thing in which arg0 leads the way

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (PP-LGS (P 由) (NP (NN 政府))) (VP (VV 领路))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 提供) (NP-IO (NN 民间) (NN 团体)) (NP-OBJ (NP (ADJP (JJ 充分)) (NP (NN 资讯))) (CC 与) (NP (DNP (ADJP (JJ 事务性)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 协助)))))))
